title: How to Mend a Broken Heart
description:
In honor of Valentine’s Day, Jillian and the team talk relationships. Plus, bone density training; and “The Love Doctor” takes a call from a woman who is considering staying in her marriage for the sake of her child.

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
